title: "Intrinsic dynamics of randomly clustered networks generate place fields and preplay of novel environments"
excerpt: "Neural circuits with small-world connectivity spontaneously emit sequences of spikes that are correlated with any of the distinct sequences of realistic place fields produced by location-modulated, monotonically varying input."
